title: Lachrymal Terminal
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015021343/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015021343/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : [Terminal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015021343/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminal) : Lachrymal Terminal**

Teardrop shaped terminal of a letter.

Lachrymal Terminals taper into the stroke, as opposed to [Ball Terminal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015021343/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ball%20Terminal)s, which join the stroke at an angle.
author: ken
